evidence.claim: Coastal Care Services utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company's documentation mentions HIPAA compliance for handling sensitive health information.
They reference FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Integration via X12 transaction sets for health insurance claims processing is mentioned in their services description.
HL7 standards are used for data exchange in their electronic health record systems.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 EDI standards in healthcare and evidence of automation needs.
